name: Sphere parkour
description:
A simple platform game where you controll a ball to finish the level !

Play with w,a,s and d keys to controll the ball & have fun !

V 0.1: First draft of the game

V 0.2: Add the 1920x1080 resolution

V 0.3: If you get out of the map, you automatically come back in the parkour

V 0.4: Fix level design to avoid speed running

V 0.5: Fix player position
